verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w works|strong="H6381"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wonder; \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* overcome.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* clear \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* kept \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w mind|strong="H2142"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mercy \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* unchanging \w faith|strong="H0530"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Make \w melody|strong="H2172"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H3068"\w* music; \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* corded instrument \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H2172"\w*.

\w With|strong="H3068"\w* wind instruments \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horn|strong="H7782"\w*, make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w cry|strong="H7321"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H7481"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* thundering, \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w all|strong="H4393"\w* \w its|strong="H3220"\w* waters; \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w all|strong="H4393"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* are \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H4393"\w*;

Let \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w streams|strong="H5104"\w* make sounds \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w* \w with|strong="H2022"\w* \w their|strong="H4222"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*; let \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w be|strong="H3162"\w* glad \w together|strong="H3162"\w*,
